caption.p: The miRNA expression profiles in each lineage of influenza B virus infection. Madin–Darby canine kidney (MDCK) cells were infected with mock, Victoria, or Yamagata lineage at multiplicity of infection (MOI) = 0.01, and collected at 6, 12, 24 hpi. ( A) Forty-six microRNAs were dysregulated in the cells infected with Victoria lineage. ( B) Eighteen microRNAs were in the cells infected with Yamagata lineage. ( C) Venn–Euler diagram shows unique and overlapped microRNA expressions in Victoria and Yamagata lineages.
